onyomiExamples.meaning: knack, skill, trick, secret, know-how, the ropes, hang, bone, skeleton, cremated remains (esp. the bones), ashes
bone marrow, medulla, true spirit, one's mind
steel frame, steel beam, steel girder

kunyomiExamples.meaning: bone, frame, outline, core, backbone, spirit, fortitude, laborious, troublesome, difficult
boning (fish or meat), deboning, watering down (a plan, bill, etc.), dilution, emasculation, taking the backbone out of, weakening
Japanese spatterdock (species of water lily, Nuphar japonica)
something that one would not expect to exist, something exceedingly rare, jellyfish bones
